short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Fixes annoying css bug of lakmusz.hu header strip

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The site lakmusz.hu suffers from a minor design bug since its start. Until they fix it, this extension can be used to re-position the header, from the middle of the page to the top.
